summary: CONSUMER STATES RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER FROM FORD MANUFACTURER ON TIRE GENERAL GRABBER AW, SIZE P275/60R17. FORD MOTOR STATED THEY DIDN'T HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE RECALL.                                                                                                          CONTINENTAL AGREED TO REPLACE THE FOUR TIRES WITH SMALL SIZE.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.    PH
